attributes.action: Condemn the unlawful missile strikes on Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
With no justifiable evidence from chemical weapons inspectors, this poisons the very idea of global peace. 
This act of dictatorship needs to be condemned by the British government.
attributes.background: Prime Minister Theresa May confirmed British involvement in the recent missile strikes on Syria, without the approval of the British Government and the United Nations. This was a rushed decision that bypasses democracy.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like to petition against the UK Government taking military action in Syria, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217290
